name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, **SQL**, **AWS**, and **Kubernetes**, with a solid foundation in developing scalable REST and GraphQL APIs. Expertise in **CI/CD** processes using **Git**, combined with hands-on experience in managing database migrations and leveraging ORMs effectively. Committed to maintaining best practices in software development lifecycle (SDLC), emphasizing SOLID, DRY, and KISS principles, alongside effective technical debt management. Experienced in conducting code reviews and implementing test automation strategies to ensure high-quality deliverables.

In addition to technical skills, I bring strong communication abilities and a passion for mentoring junior developers, fostering a collaborative environment conducive to knowledge sharing. My experience includes building cloud-native applications on **AWS**, and designing microservices architecture that supports event-driven systems, ensuring secure and compliant solutions aligned with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
